review: "If You Give a T-Rex a Bone" is an average read, particularly suitable for those with a keen interest in dinosaurs. While the book offers educational content and a unique circular storytelling style, it lacks the depth and innovative format that I typically enjoy in my reads. The narrative, though engaging for its target audience, does not provide the same level of nuance and insight that I appreciate in business and poetry books. It's a well-executed concept but falls short of my expectations for originality and depth.
